alert.note: Alert for Scotland (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 15 at 7:52PM CST until December 15 at 8:30PM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM CST FOR WESTERN VAN BUREN...KEOKUK...WESTERN JEFFERSON AND SCOTLAND COUNTIES... At 751 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Delta to near Lancaster, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Fairfield, Sigourney, Memphis, Keosauqua, Hedrick, What Cheer, Richland, Batavia, Birmingham, Milton, Delta, Libertyville, Maharishi Vedic City, Keswick, Cantril, South English, Packwood, Harper, Martinsburg and Rutledge. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CST for southeastern and east central Iowa...and northeastern Missouri. This is a DANGEROUS SITUATION. These storms are producing widespread wind damage. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
